Adrian Cockcroft - Technology Fellow & Architect Behind Netflix Cloud Infrastructure

ABSTRACT
What does it mean to be simple or complicated? How can we manage complexity when we scale up systems? It's Simple...

Why do people find it horrifying when [...]
